{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=EnMesh |revision=Dot (EMD1) |series=AC1300 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |type=access point, mesh node, |fcc_id=A8J-EMD1 |fcc_date=06/05/2018 |flags=Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, Internet Speed Test, |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE726PYZ, E072600; |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE726PYZ, E072600; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE726PYZ, E072600; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip2_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN/BT FEM;Skyworks;SKY85303-11;SKY11, 85303, <..>;2;,,, 5GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85748-11;SKY, 748, 2I00F;2; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 Wave 2 Dual-Band Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.engeniustech.com/engenius-products/enmesh-mesh-dot-whole-home-wifi-system/}} "EMD1 (FCC) MB VER:0.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Additional models are also mentioned in FCC docs. *'''EMD1''' is the main test model: ''EnGenius EnMesh Dot'' *'''ERP1''' is internally identical to the EMD1 but it only supports :Repeater mode while EMD1 supports Mesh mode. *'''EMD2''' is powered via PoE or an external power supply :instead of direct AC power but has identical RF circuitry. ===See also=== * [[List of Wireless Systems]] * [[EnGenius EnMesh (EMR3000v2)]]
